concept.description: Merges channel descriptors with the same address (e.q. in different files).
concept.cypher: MATCH (c1:Channel),(c2:Channel) WHERE c1.address=c2.address AND c1<>c2 MERGE (c1)-[:RESOLVES_TO]->(c2) RETURN count(*) as Channels

concept.description: Merges sending operations to the receiving operation.
concept.cypher: MATCH (operationSend:Operation{action:"send"})-[:ON_CHANNEL]->(:Channel)-[*]->(:Channel)-[:RESOLVES_TO]->(:Channel)<-[*]-(:Channel)<-[:ON_CHANNEL]-(operationReceive:Operation) MERGE (operationSend)-[:SENDS_TO]->(operationReceive) RETURN count(*) as Operations

MATCH (node:AsyncAPI)-[r]->(source:Reference:AsyncAPI)-[:REFERENCES*1..2]->(target:AsyncAPI) WHERE NOT (target)-[:REFERENCES]->(:AsyncAPI) AND NOT (node)-[:REFERENCES]->(source) MERGE (source)-[:RESOLVES_TO]->(target) RETURN count(source) as Source, count(node) as Node
